toolbox.clean_memory_confirm_message:
You are about to perform [Memory Cleaning].

This will attempt to reduce the working set of running processes, which may cause:
• Temporary lag or reload in some programs
• Rare cases of application errors or crashes
• You can add processes to the whitelist in Settings to exclude them

Do you want to continue?
toolbox.clean_temp_confirm_message:
You are about to clean the system temporary folder (%TEMP%).

This may cause:
• Some temporary files in use cannot be deleted (normal)
• Some applications may rebuild cache and start slower once

Do you want to continue?
